statements: DELETE FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions WHERE quantum_model = 'IBM Quantum';
DELETE FROM QuantumHardwarePredictions WHERE hardware_name = 'IBM Quantum Computer' AND quantum_model = 'IBM Q System One';
DELETE FROM hardware_performance WHERE model_name = 'Laptop A' AND performance_score < 80;
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE hardware_id = 123 AND measurement_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE hardware_id = 5 AND metric_date < '2022-01-01';
